Member.Name: Enable
Member.Description: 0 - Disable 1 - Enable the command: Trigger allowed only. 2 - Enable the command: Polling and trigger allowed.

Member.Name: Mode
Member.Description: Node address of the target device on the network (1â€“255).

Member.Name: Function
Member.Description: Function code for the command. 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 15, and 16 allowed for master and slave. 30 allowed for slave only.
